name: Froggie Beamie
description:
Froggie awoke. It's in the Lab.

Froggie doesn't remember anything. 
As Froggie go from room to room, Froggie found that they can DASH.

The very next room, floating into the void a TELEPORT GUN.  

By shooting its bullet through a special wall, it becomes materialized and could switch collided object to Froggie's position.

Escape from the Lab!

As you traverse as Froggie look at your surrounding. The monitors sometimes guide you.

  • Programming & Art : PillowByte
  • Background Music: SpiralOre - His Youtube

This game is my totem. A totem for breaking the curse that is "aspiring new game developer wants to make the next big MMORPG and never release a damn game".
If you found bugs or feedback that can improve the game, I'd be very glad and open to hearing it. Contact me or comment down below!
